todos.title: Add a Todo
todos.description: Click the plus icon in the bottom right

todos.title: View a Todo
todos.description: Click the arrow icon to view a Todo

todos.title: Complete a Todo
todos.description: Click the status button to the left

todos.title: Delete a Todo
todos.description: View a Todo and click the Delete button

todos.title: Edit a Todo
todos.description: View a Todo and click the Edit button

todos.title: Filter Todos
todos.description: Click the Filter tab at the top of the list
